abstract: Lakshmi Mittal did indeed consider buying a stake in bid target Rio Tinto to expand his interests in iron ore but has decided against it for now, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Lakshmi Mittal did indeed consider buying a stake in bid target Rio Tinto to expand his interests in iron ore but has decided against it for now, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: Mittal Not Interested in Rio Tinto, For Now
